text: Abaho munhu yong'ala yasole bunho da hisopo yadivabike mgamazi gago abaho yadimizile dihema na viya vose vili mng'anda na iwanhu weli mumo mng'anda. Vivija yammizile gago gamazi, munhu ayo yakwasile imizege ya munhu yafile hebu ayo yakwasile imaiti ya munhu yakomigwe hebu imunhu yakwasile maiti ya munhu yafile mwenyego hebu imunhu yakwasile panga.
